sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Overview({ user, dashboardData, error }) { return ( <>

Welcome to your Dashboard, {user.username}!

{error && (
{error}
)}

Profile Information

Username: {user.username}

Email: {user.email}

Role: {user.role}

Status: {user.role === 'User' ? 'In Review' : 'Active'}

User ID: {user.id}

{dashboardData && ( <>

Statistics

Total Users: {dashboardData.data.totalUsers}

Status: {user.role === 'User' ? 'In Review' : 'Active'}

Recent Activity

{dashboardData.data.recentActivity.map((activity, index) => (

{activity.action}

{new Date(activity.timestamp).toLocaleString()}
))}
)}

Quick Actions

This is where you can add more functionality to your dashboard.

Some ideas:

  • User management
  • Data analytics
  • Settings configuration
  • File uploads
); } export default Overview;
